description:
Allstate℠  Mobile is your insurance on the go—offering easy bill pay, claims service, policy management, and roadside & accident support that you can access anywhere anytime. 

The Allstate℠  Mobile app lets you:  

•Pay Your Bill – Make or schedule a payment anytime, anywhere with your bank account or a credit/debit card.
•View Policy & Auto Information – Manage your policy details and access your auto information anytime you need it. 
•QuickFoto Claim℠  – For qualifying claims, receive a quick auto claim estimate by simply submitting damage photos via the app. 
•File a Claim – Start an auto or property claim in just a few simple steps.
•Check Claims Status – Check the status and details of your claim any time, plus send a message to your claim rep right from the app.
•Get Roadside Help – Car break down? Need help now? Emergency roadside service is open to everyone.
•Drivewise® - Program enrollees can check their driving performance and progress right from the app. 
•Find an Agent – Access your agent’s profile or find and connect with a nearby agent using your phone’s GPS.
releaseNotes:
New features in this release include:

      •       Preference Center – Mobile app users can change communication preferences (e.g. payment confirmations, allstate updates, etc.) and manage their online profile.
  
      •       Additional Policy Types – Pay My Bill and View Policy Information functionalities will be added for mobile home, personal umbrella, boat owners and specialty auto.  

      •       Parking Locator – Allows users to find their parked vehicle through location services using their Allstate Mobile app.  

      •       Gas Finder – Users can find close gas stations in their area and compare gas prices for each to determine the best fit for them.  

      •       Allstate Car Buying Service – The mobile app will be able to link to TrueCar’s car buying service.  Allstate customers who access the service via these platforms are eligible for a buyer’s bonus.
